content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #91027 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
if this issue turns turns out to another matter from the suggested #88765, I'd say P-high (otherwise perhaps could be closed)
I thought ehuss said #88765 fixed this bug though?
right, so it's also my understanding. But he also left a mention to wg-llvm for a comment, so I assume they can validate

I've tried reproducing on the playground combining nightly, stable, debug compile, release compile to no avail.
This makes me suspect a windows-only issue. Uhm ... I wonder perhaps adding this label.

this needs investigation or a more stable repro ("Minor perturbations cause the release build to print CORRECT"), I think.
Issue #91027 has been closed while requested for prioritization.
